member.name: T:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.CustomTypesResolver
member.summary: Class to help resolving .NET types that are not directly resolvable or have unnecessary heavy structure (CultureInfo, Encoding, etc.) The class replaces the .NET type with a custom type created at runtime for serialization needs.

member.name: T:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.ReportJsonSerializer
member.summary: Serializes and deserializes objects into and from JSON. This class is dedicated for serializing and deserializing objects only from the namespace.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.ReportJsonSerializer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.ReportJsonSerializer.Serialize(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.Formatting)
member.summary: Serializes the specified value and writes the JSON document to the specified .
member.param: The used to write the JSON document.
Specifies formatting options for the JsonTextWriter. Default is Formatting.None.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.ReportJsonSerializer.Deserialize(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserializes the JSON document contained by the specified .
member.param: The that contains the JSON document to deserialize.
member.remarks: Use the stream parameter to specify an object that derives from the class, which is designed to write to streams. Classes that derive from the class include: , , , etc.
member.example: The following example deserializes an object using a :

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.ReportJsonSerializer.Deserialize(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes the JSON string to a report document.
member.param: The string that contains the JSON document.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.TypeSchemaSerializer.WriteMember(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonTextWriter)
member.summary: Serializes the current MemberInfo instance (property or field in Enum).

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.TypeSchemaSerializer.EnumToString(System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Converts enum value to its string representation provided from the TypeConverter rather than returning the ordinal value of the enum member or the actual enum member name. Example: UnitType members must be serialized with their short names ("px", "pt") rather than "Pixel", "Point", etc. Example: ReportParameter.Type must be serialied as "Boolean", "String", etc. rather than 0, 4, etc.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.TypeSchemaSerializer.IsDisabledTypeConverter(System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter)
member.summary: Returns if the type converter should be used on a case by case basis.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.TypeSchemaSerializer.WriteNonDefaultValue``1(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonTextWriter,System.String,System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Writes the current value if it differs from the default value for this type.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.JsonSerialization.TypeSchemaSerializer.WriteNonDefaultValue``1(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonTextWriter,System.String,System.Func{``0},System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes the current value if it differs from the default value for this type.
